medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started after eating dinner, located in the b/l upper quadrants, associated with nausea and two episodes of non-bloody emesis. Pain and nausea persisted, leading to presentation at OSH and later to the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: NIDDM, HTN, previous left knee arthroscopy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother deceased from pancreatic cancer, father deceased from MI, one brother had DM, one sister had lung cancer. Six healthy children.
